description: German Shepherds are a breed of dog originating in Germany in 1899. Originally bred to work on farms, including herding sheep and other livestock, they have since become known for their work as police dogs and guides. Known as one of the most loyal and handsome breeds, their popularity is easily understood.  Now you can learn all about German Shepherds with this comprehensive eBook covering everything you could want to know about this dog breed!  Topics discussed include the dog's history, breed standards, health, characteristics and training tips.  Download this title today and have a guide book in your pocket!
